name: backend
description: This is the backend service for the Financial Tracker application, designed to manage and track user financial transactions efficiently. The backend is built with Node.js and Express, leveraging a PostgreSQL database. It provides a RESTful API for creating and managing income and expense entries, viewing transaction history, calculating real-time balances, setting spending limits, and triggering alerts based on user-defined thresholds.
